pkgmetadata.longdescription: Cryptographic Hash, Extendable-Output and Base64 Functions // Fast and memory-efficient streaming hash functions and base64 encoding and decoding. Performs direct hashing of strings and raw vectors. Stream hashes files potentially larger than memory, as well as in-memory objects through R's serialization mechanism. Implementations include the SHA-256, SHA-3 and 'Keccak' cryptographic hash functions, SHAKE256 extendable- output function (XOF), and 'SipHash' pseudo-random function.
